courses.title: Introduction to Energy
courses.description: An overview of energy concepts, types, and sources.

modules.moduleDescription: Learn about the fundamental concepts of energy.
Explore different types of energy including kinetic, potential, and thermal energy.

courses.title: Mechanics Fundamentals
courses.description: A comprehensive course on the principles of mechanics.

modules.moduleDescription: Study the three laws of motion and their applications.
Understand the relationship between forces and motion.
